review.comment: I highly recommend JackRabbit High Speed hosting. Very fast and great customer service.

Excellent
The best best hosting!!
Thank you 😊

JackRabbit  it's the Best hosting!!
Thank you for your service 🙏
Five star - fast, efficient and friendly service. Clint is fantastic to deal with and provides great support. Would highly recommend.
I changed my accountant from GoDaddy to JackRabbit, best decision so far, support team is very quick, service is impacable. Happy to be with them.

A year ago, I started a teaching organization. The task of doing this felt overwhelming! A website was a necessity and I wanted to do the development and maintenance thereof myself. I discovered Clinton Gorman’s course “How to Create Make build an Online Ecommerce Store Website” on Udemy. Clinton’s course took the strain out of the task and within one week I was well on my way of building an awesome website. His presentations are clear, concise and have excellent flow, and he has the ability to simplify many of the complex technical issues. Moreover, whenever I got stuck and needed assistance, he provided a friendly, speedy and quality service. JackRabbit is an excellent choice for a reliable hosting service.

I just moved 10 sites to JackRabbit Hosting because I wanted to increase speed and efficient page loading. That's a huge project for my level of skill and knowledge.

Clint @ JackRabbit moved those sites for me as part of the transfer. I have to say the customer service was second to none! He let me know what he needed from me and handled everything else.

Along the way, he was also able to make suggestions to correct page load speed issues.

Now the sites are loading very fast and I'm extremely happy with the move. I would not hesitate to recommend JackRabbit Hosting to anyone who wants great service and fast web sites.
I have an online store and have been very impressed with the help, hosting and guidance given by Jackrabbit. Customer service is outstanding and friendly! I give them the highest recommendation.
A solid host company with dedicated support staff, and fast web servers! Good value for money!
The best customer service I have come across in any company. Highly recommend this hosting platform to everyone.

5 stars all around, I am very happy to be with Jackrabbit. Excellent choice for a  fast and reliable hosting service. Web loading times are VERY fast. The customer service team really goes above and beyond when it help is needed. And FAST too! I don't think I've ever had to wait for a response for more than 20 minutes. I would say that for the service you're getting, this is a steal for the price you pay. I feel really fortunate for finding JR.
Wonderful service. Great support. Always answering questions and giving me the best feedback while helping troubleshoot and problems I have. 5 start definitely!

I came from GoDaddy, I now have the smart plan with JackRabbit and  4 websites hosted by them. They are more affordable, I  Couldn't have been better with the speed and price. They are also pretty quick with response time to any issues I have.  FREE SSL Certificates!
it is my first time building a website and did not know much about it but  JackRabbit hosting helps me a lot, it is easy to manage, customer service is outstanding. I definitely recommend it :)
JackRabbit is awesome.  It is fast, I never have any problems and their service is incredible.  If you need help with something they are there for you.  I highly recommend JackRabbit.

I have been with JackRabbit High Speed Hosting for 6 months as I write this.  I have the highest respect for the management, and the service and responsiveness that I receive.  I have not had experience with creating a web page before, and any question I have are answered thoroughly and completely, and the service isn't complete until they are sure I am satisfied.
review.review_reply: Thank you William! It's our pleasure to make sure you're happy.

review.comment: JackRabbit is much better than my last host. It's faster and the support is great, I've had no issues since I've moved my sites over.  It's the best ever!!!
